answer:
<p>Naming your original data.frame <code>v</code>, we have this:</p>

<pre class="lang-r s-code-block"><code class="hljs language-r"><span class="hljs-operator">&gt;</span> s <span class="hljs-operator">&lt;-</span> strsplit<span class="hljs-punctuation">(</span><span class="hljs-built_in">as.character</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">(</span>v<span class="hljs-operator">$</span>director<span class="hljs-punctuation">)</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-string">','</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">)</span>
<span class="hljs-operator">&gt;</span> data.frame<span class="hljs-punctuation">(</span>director<span class="hljs-operator">=</span>unlist<span class="hljs-punctuation">(</span>s<span class="hljs-punctuation">)</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> AB<span class="hljs-operator">=</span><span class="hljs-built_in">rep</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">(</span>v<span class="hljs-operator">$</span>AB<span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> sapply<span class="hljs-punctuation">(</span>s<span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> FUN<span class="hljs-operator">=</span><span class="hljs-built_in">length</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">)</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">)</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">)</span>
                      director AB
<span class="hljs-number">1</span>                 Aaron Blaise  A
<span class="hljs-number">2</span>                   Bob Walker  A
<span class="hljs-number">3</span>               Akira Kurosawa  B
<span class="hljs-number">4</span>               Alan J. Pakula  A
<span class="hljs-number">5</span>                  Alan Parker  A
<span class="hljs-number">6</span>           Alejandro Amenabar  B
<span class="hljs-number">7</span>  Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu  B
<span class="hljs-number">8</span>  Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu  B
<span class="hljs-number">9</span>             Benicio Del Toro  B
<span class="hljs-number">10</span> Alejandro González Iñárritu  A
<span class="hljs-number">11</span>                 Alex Proyas  B
<span class="hljs-number">12</span>              Alexander Hall  A
<span class="hljs-number">13</span>              Alfonso Cuaron  B
<span class="hljs-number">14</span>            Alfred Hitchcock  A
<span class="hljs-number">15</span>              Anatole Litvak  A
<span class="hljs-number">16</span>              Andrew Adamson  B
<span class="hljs-number">17</span>                 Marilyn Fox  B
<span class="hljs-number">18</span>              Andrew Dominik  B
<span class="hljs-number">19</span>              Andrew Stanton  B
<span class="hljs-number">20</span>              Andrew Stanton  B
<span class="hljs-number">21</span>                 Lee Unkrich  B
<span class="hljs-number">22</span>              Angelina Jolie  B
<span class="hljs-number">23</span>              John Stevenson  B
<span class="hljs-number">24</span>               Anne Fontaine  B
<span class="hljs-number">25</span>              Anthony Harvey  A
</code></pre>

<p>Note the use of <code>rep</code> to build the new AB column.  Here, <code>sapply</code> returns the number of names in each of the original rows.</p>
